c2edda1a-9eda-480d-b38e-585d0baf824b.description: The AGS Way approach provides our employees a baseline standard from which our RPO programs can deliver best practices consistently, across all clients. It offers tools that help teams properly manage the recruitment process through the engagement of stakeholders in a consultative manner, allowing everyone at AGS to demonstrate our expertise and value. AGS Way creates a consistent "gold standard" as it establishes a consistent set of best practices globally.
c2edda1a-9eda-480d-b38e-585d0baf824b.name: AGS Way RPO

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Course: Complete all AGS Way RPO Degreed pathways, when applicable
Course: Complete all live webinars

a51dba87-9345-4223-bedb-b326c4e307f8.description: Earners of this badge completed a highly interactive workshop that educates hiring managers on foundational diversity and inclusion concepts around stereotypes, explicit and implicit biases, including voice and resumes bias in the recruiting and interviewing processes. They were also taught the fundamentals of competency-based interviewing to ensure inclusive interviewing practices, including various exercises and breakouts to trial their learnings in a safe space.
a51dba87-9345-4223-bedb-b326c4e307f8.name: Fundamentals of Inclusive Hiring

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Action: Attend a multi-session, interactive, facilitated workshop
Action: Participate in questionnaires, complete workbook exercises, and collaborate in breakout sessions discussing various biases in hiring
Action: Complete self-reflective activities to discover and identify personal biases
Action: Participate in a thorough and interactive training session from AGS' Head of Talent Acquisition on AGS' 3-Pronged Hiring approach
Action: Learn best practices to use STAR interview questions, and implement various behavioral interviewing techniques

264b2986-8fd2-4420-b443-2d1f0a80dece.description: The Excelerate Program is a intensive 12-week leadership development program for people and thought leaders, structured around the Allegis Global Solutions Competency Framework. Further, they cascade Tech Champ sessions trainings or items to the wider PMO team. They provide feedback on VMS related items and utilize VMS community pages. Tech Ops will sign off on new badge earners and badges will expire January 31st of each year.

a1dcfc8a-f972-456a-9a8d-01e955dc558e.description: Earners of this badge have demonstrated their ability to identify and prioritize key stakeholders, and understand and align stakeholder expectations with the help of a Stakeholder Map. d99152d0-ce5b-41a6-87a6-0d58a2c64e36.description: Earners of this badge led an Employee Resource Group (ERG) at AGS which entailed obtaining the skills to lead peers, developing others, influencing the organization, building ERG membership, and setting an annual operating plan that worked to meet established goals for in an entire year. They also drove membership, established a high functioning leadership team, and aligned the ERG goals to AGS' overall I&D business strategy.

Action: Created an annual operating plan that clearly aligns to our organization's business strategy and I&D strategy

Action: Created and met the goals set in their annual operating plan and built a strong leadership team to succeed their role upon completion of the one year term (if leader elects to no longer lead the ERG)

5aa5e3dd-475e-47e7-bd1f-6bb1a719f952.description: Earners of this badge acted as an Executive Sponsor for at least one of our Employee Resource Groups at AGS which entailed providing strategic support to the ERG lead(s), acting as a sponsor and mentor for the ERG lead(s) and council, ensuring ERG goals are being met, assisting in mitigating and removing obstacles the ERGs face, and counseling the ERG on their Annual Operating Plan.

Earners of this badge advised ERGs on applying their goals to create a business impact.

Earners of this badge provided strategic business insight to remove barriers or obstacles the ERG may face.

9e4baf8f-b336-4e56-ad51-dd655a18edfe.description: Earners of this badge have broadened their DEI development and demonstrate active inclusion with their peers.
9e4baf8f-b336-4e56-ad51-dd655a18edfe.name: Inclusive Development: Peer Influencer

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of the "DEI - Empowering Diverse Talent" pathway within the DEI Continuous Learning Journey
Must submit two commitments of "Call to Action" activities for the "DEI - Empowering Diverse Talent" (Others) pathway within the DEI Continuous Learning Journey

10ab54f0-f955-4a9e-9fa2-f0154ab0ad02.description: Earners of this badge have broadened their DEI development and demonstrated active allyship in the four categories of Self, Others, Team, and Organization. The earners can be looked upon as DEI leaders within AGS.
10ab54f0-f955-4a9e-9fa2-f0154ab0ad02.name: Inclusive Development: DE&I Advocate

badge_template_activities.title: Completion of all pathways within the DEI Continuous Learning Journey including: DEI - Embracing Difference (Self), DEI - Empowering Diverse Talent (Others), DEI - Enabling Diverse Thinking Teams (Team), and DEI - Embedding DE&I (Organization)
Submitting two commitments of "Call to Action" activities for each of the four pathways within the DEI Continuous Learning Journey

bfee94ab-1121-4dfe-a945-7ff3a880731f.description: Earners of this badge are able to effectively navigate AGS360 CRS and utilize it to ensure client intel is documented correctly, creating a repository to maintain historical client knowledge. It will enhance the ability to develop internal resources through increased business development and client confidence.
bfee94ab-1121-4dfe-a945-7ff3a880731f.name: AGS360 CRM

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Must be a Program Leader (Program Executive or Program Manager) or in Business Development
Action: Completion of AGS360 CRM pathway in Degreed

Requires Program Executive or Executive Director review and evaluation of new Users activity and documentation/business development efficacy over a 4 month period - including SLA’s completely entered, Stakeholders entered, Using conversations/events activities, and Strategic Roadmap – Projects entered.

d13d89af-f2e4-4768-b263-cdfa40ad9618.description: Earners of this badge have completed one of six Operational Leadership Development Programs in the area of AGS Business, Products and Services. To achieve this badge the individual has demonstrated a business development mindset, are able to correlate AGS offerings against the competitor landscape, and has a deep understanding of AGS products and services.
d13d89af-f2e4-4768-b263-cdfa40ad9618.name: AGS Business, Products and Services: Operations Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Action: Complete all live workshops and all pre- and post-workshop activities
Assessment: Achieve a score of 90%+ on the AGS Business, Products and Services Assessment

73bf9424-b221-449a-8a98-e0da7ec9d03a.description: Earners of this badge have completed one of six Operational Leadership Development Programs in the area of change management. To achieve this badge the individual has demonstrated their comprehension of change management philosophies, knowledge of how to drive program change, and has built the skills required to implement change successfully.
73bf9424-b221-449a-8a98-e0da7ec9d03a.name: Change Management: Operations Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Action: Complete all live workshops and all pre- and post-workshop activities
Assessment: Achieve a score of 90%+ on the Change Management Assessment

3fee6b65-2c65-425c-8d6e-6b6808d5fcaf.description: Earners of this badge have completed one of six Operational Leadership Development Programs in the area of financial management. To achieve this badge the individual has profiled their competence in forecasting, are adept at identifying financial influencers, and have a proven fiscal confidence, accountability, and responsibility.
3fee6b65-2c65-425c-8d6e-6b6808d5fcaf.name: Financial Management: Operations Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Action: Complete all live workshops and all pre- and post-workshop activities
Assessment: Achieve a repeated and improved forecasting vs actuals financial results

a5197eee-c1d5-4e88-a60e-2be3eec7e29c.description: Earners of this badge have completed one of six Operational Leadership Development Programs in the area of leadership. To achieve this badge the individual has demonstrated their commitment to leadership and an aptitude for coaching, built engagement and supported performance within their teams.
a5197eee-c1d5-4e88-a60e-2be3eec7e29c.name: Leading Success: Operations Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Action: Complete all live workshops and all pre- and post-workshop activities
Assessment: Achieve a score of 90%+ on the Leading Success Assessment

7b999467-3091-4857-908b-e8e996d90e44.description: Earners of this badge have undertaken self-directed and structured learning in Business Intelligence, Financial Management, Change Management, Business Development, Strategic Thinking and People Leadership. Their competency in leading client and operational teams at a program executive level has been endorsed by a senior leader of AGS.
7b999467-3091-4857-908b-e8e996d90e44.name: Master: Operations Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Business Intelligence: Operations Leadership Development Program
Financial Management: Operations Leadership Development Program
Change Management: Operations Leadership Development Program
AGS Business, Products and Services: Operations Leadership Development Program
Run, Grow, Transform: Operations Leadership Development Program
Leading Success: Operations Leadership Development Program
Executive Director endorsement required

22a06739-e6f0-4ccc-b366-eb5975f8b7cf.description: Earners of this badge have completed one of six Operational Leadership Development Programs in the area of program management. To achieve this badge the individual has participated in curriculum which explored the difference between continuous improvement and transformation. They have demonstrated a consultative spirit and design thinking principles to ‘think big’ and create a strategic road map.
22a06739-e6f0-4ccc-b366-eb5975f8b7cf.name: Run, Grow, Transform: Operations Leadership Development Program

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Action: Complete all live workshops and all pre- and post-workshop activities
Action: Complete additional criteria determined in 2022
Assessment: Achieve a score of 90%+ on the Strategic Thinking Assessment

cd30bdb4-29ec-419d-a18b-0eaa178d555a.description: Earners of this badge have been awarded the Supply Chain Quarterly Recognition. They have showcased significant impact within the previous quarter and exemplified our AGS core values.
cd30bdb4-29ec-419d-a18b-0eaa178d555a.name: Supply Chain Quarterly Recognition

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Recipient has received at least one Supply Chain Quarterly Recognition award, by showcasing our AGS core values and making an impact to our clients and internal teams throughout the quarter.

d872b606-a89d-4553-b459-528083a02f79.description: Earners of this badge have regularly attended release note sessions and demonstrated an interest in improving the VMS via implementing new releases where possible. They have demonstrated that they have shared this with the client and actively provide any feedback from them accordingly. Earners have navigated and utilized the VMS community/help pages to obtain more information on release features. Tech Ops has signed off on new badge earners and badges expire on January 31st of each year.
d872b606-a89d-4553-b459-528083a02f79.name: Tech Champion Innovator

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Action: Provide feedback on all releases and suggest improvements
Tech Champion

a18e320f-c01a-4733-8390-86a4aa8fb7b3.description: Earners of this badge are a valued tech partner, who consults with Tech Ops Analysts on the Programe/Technology roadmaps. This badge is earned by demonstrating collaboration via strategy sessions, being keen to learn more around the VMS, providing quality feedback, and ideas for future Tech Champ sessions. Tech Ops will sign off on new badge earners and badges will expire January 31st of each year.
a18e320f-c01a-4733-8390-86a4aa8fb7b3.name: Tech Champion Pro

badge_template_activities.title: Must be an employee of Allegis Global Solutions
Tech Champion
Action: Attend regular Tech Champ session (4 for NA and APAC, 6 for EMEA) and provide regular feedback on those sessions
Knowledge: Demonstrate a higher level of knowledge on your MSP account and also a solid understanding of the VMS and how it applies
Action: Communicate consistently with the Tech Analyst and provide constructive feedback for future sessions
